name: ButtonBox
description:
Small puzzle platformer for Weekly Game Jam 175 - 2 Button Physics.

Flip the button boxes to control the various red and green objects to get to the end.

WAD to move and jump.

Space to flip the box

R to reset

There are some bugs that appeared with the webgl version:

- A slight buzzing when holding a button down.

- Somewhat awkward interactions with buttons on platforms

- Transition is broken af lol
